title: # 498 - Tony Hawk, Jason Ellis & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with Tony Hawk and Jason Ellis. We talk about their worst injuries from skateboarding, how Tony started Birdhouse, what Tony did the night of the 900, The X Games, wakeboarding, THPS, and much more! 

 

Check out their Podcast Hawk Vs Wolf: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/hawk-vs-wolf-podcast/id1553164725 

 

Hawk Vs Wolf Instagram

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/hawkvswolf 

 

This episode is brought to you by Fight Camp. Get an additional pair of gloves for free at http://www.joinfightcamp.com/bert 

 

This episode is also brought to you by Better Help. Get 10% off your first month with the discount code “BERT”. Get started today at http://www.betterhelp.com/bert  

 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com

Facebook: http://www.Facebook.com/BertKreischer 

Instagram: http://www.Instagram.com/bertkreischer
